post:
**NatcoWeb, a KVM based virtual private server provider, has launched its solid state drive (SSD) VPS offerings in its New Jersey area hosting facilities. Our servers have also been upgraded for high performance utilization of KVM and SSD for satisfaction of new and current clients.

Our VPS node servers run dual core Intel Xeon L5640 6-Core 2.26Ghz processors with 48GB of RAM. Our RAID controller for the SSD VPS node configuration is 42R-LSI00328 RAID 9271-4i 1-pt SAS2 1Gb DDR3 PCIe 3.0 SGL and we use Intel SSD 520 Series SATA3 6G 25nm MLC Cherryville hard drives. These SSD VPS nodes are ready to handle whatever demanding project you have and will increase the performance of MySQL.

The servers are located in TelX facility in Clifton, NJ. The dc is SAS 70 type II certified environment where we weathered Sandy Hurricane without downtime for our clietnts' servers due to the on-site power generator. **

We have recently created our SSD Mini offer](http://www.natcoweb.com/SSDmini.html#) The deal includes:

HDD: 5 Gb
RAM: 128 Mb
Traffic: 200 Gb
CPU: 1 VCPU
IPv4: 1
IPv6: 64
**Price: $6.95/mo **

[Order Now! ](http://www.natcoweb.com/SSDmini.html#)



**Each account includes:**

99,999% uptime guarantee
**Instant setup* **

Domains unlimited

**Secure datacenter environment**
Premium connectivity providers:Level3, AboveNet, Highwinds




**

Debian and Centos Linux OS
